author: pietjepuk
content:
I liked this short video to give a quick overview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-qwSAFcicg8

If you want more detail, I suggest checking out the annotated specs:
- https://github.com/ethereum/annotated-spec
- https://benjaminion.xyz/eth2-annotated-spec/phase0/beacon-chain/

As far as choosing the slot proposer, search for `compute_proposer_index`
